headline: FlexNetworks Doubles Capacity into MICE Internet Exchange to Support Surge in Cloud and Content Traffic
summary: FlexNetworks: Building Canadaâ€™s Fibre Future FlexNetworks leadership members review fibre construction plans during a network build.
